HOWTO: Update this documentation
================================

----------------
1. Prerequisites
----------------

Execute all of the steps described in :ref:`Setup the Web Crawler - Prerequisites <setup-preq_label>`.

---------------------------
2. Update the Documentation
---------------------------

.. code-block:: bash

    cd 24ws-ase-pr-qse-02/price_crawler/docs
    make clean && make html

---------------------------
3. View the Documentation
---------------------------

Open the file: **24ws-ase-pr-qse-02/price_crawler/docs/build/html/index.html**
